Interface Communication

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BluetoothCommunication

    public interface Communication

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<Device> getCachedDevices()
      Method that is going to return cached devices, after the first inquiry , when called as a first time in application will return paired devices only.
      void getDevicesByInquiry()
      Method that ignores cached values and performs even long running inquiry, searching for devices.
      boolean isBusy()
      Method checks if the Communication module is busy.
      boolean isDeviceAbleToCommunicateUsingService(Device device, Service service)
      Method that checks whether Device is able to communicate with specific Service protocol.
      void prepareCommunicationBundle() 
      void registerBTReceiver(Activity btPropertiesActivity) 
      void unregisterBTReceiver(Activity btPropertiesActivity)
